mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT z.idn_zone as key, z.zone_code as value FROM TPA_TZONE z, TPA_TBASE_INV_MODE_ZONE mz WHERE z.IDN_ZONE = mz.IDN_ZONE AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) between mz.START_DATE AND NVL(mz.END_DATE, to_date('9999-12-31','yyyy-mm-dd')) AND Z.IDN_PIPELINE_SYSTEM = #{systemId} order by 1

select im.idn_base_inv_mode as key, im.mode_code as value from TPA_TBASE_INV_MODE im, TPA_TBASE_INV_MODE_zone imz, TPA_TZONE z where im.idn_base_inv_mode = imz.idn_base_inv_mode AND imz.idn_zone = z.idn_zone AND z.idn_zone = #{zoneId}

SELECT a.idn_allocation as key, to_char(a.version_date, 'DD/MM/YY HH24:MI:SS FF9') AS value FROM tpa_tallocation a, tpa_tallocation_origin ao WHERE a.idn_pipeline_system = #{systemId} AND ao.origin_code IN ('BALANCE', 'CLOSING_PROCESS') AND a.idn_allocation_type = (SELECT t.idn_allocation_type FROM tpa_tallocation_type t WHERE t.type_code = 'INTRADAY') AND a.idn_allocation_origin = ao.idn_allocation_origin AND to_char(a.gas_day,'DD/MM/YY') = to_char(#{date},'DD/MM/YY') AND a.gas_day = trunc(a.version_date) GROUP BY idn_allocation, to_char(a.version_date, 'DD/MM/YY HH24:MI:SS FF9') ORDER BY idn_allocation, to_char(a.version_date, 'DD/MM/YY HH24:MI:SS FF9')
